name: CreDA
description: CreDA (Credit DeFi Alliance) is the first trusted credit rating system for the world of Decentralized Finance and the link between on-chain and traditional financial systems. Weâ€™re building the trust architecture that underpins Web3, helping minimize risk for existing and emerging platforms and enabling access to capital by reducing the need for crippling amounts of collateral while opening up DeFI to billions of people without access to traditional banking.
